product_title: Canon EOS R50 Mirrorless Camera RF-S18-45mm F4.5-6.3 is STM Lens Kit, 24.2 Megapixel CMOS (APS-C) Sensor, 4K Video, Hybrid Camera, Photo and Video, Vlogging, Content Creator, RF Mount, Black
product_availability: Only 4 left in stock - order soon.
about_product: High Image Quality: Canon EOS R50 4K digital camera features a 24.2 Megapixel CMOS (APS-C) sensor and DIGIC X processor for stunning image clarity and level of detail
High-Speed Continuous Shooting: Capture fast action with up to 12 fps with Electronic First Curtain shutter and up tp 15 fps with Electronic Shutter for a superior vlogging camera

Advanced Auto Focus: Dual Pixel CMOS AF II covers up to 100% x 100% area with 651 AF zones; features auto subject detection and tracking of people, animals, and vehicles using deep learning technology — perfect 4K camera for video recording

Exceptional Low-Light Performance: Advanced A+ Assist offers an expanded array of auto-compatible scenes for greater expressive capability in auto mode and enables great imagery even in difficult settings such as night and backlit scenarios.

Fluid Video Capture: Video recording features such as 6K oversampled uncropped 4K movie at up to 30 fps, Full-HD High-frame rate movie recording at up to 120 fps: Movie for Close-up Demo Mode quickly and automatically switches focus to the subject closest to the camera
Superior Viewing Experience: 2.36-million-dot EVF with Clear View LCD II vari-angle touchscreen on this digital camera for easy composition and shooting from virtually any angle

Built-In Bluetooth and Wi-Fi Capability: Enable wireless functions, such as file viewing and transfer, by connecting the video camera to Wi-Fi; use the free Canon Camera Connect app to connect your camera to compatible smart devices via Bluetooth pairing
product_description: Capture the moment just as you imagine it with the compact and lightweight EOS R50. Intuitive photo functions capture beautiful images automatically, making photography fun, simple, and convenient. Featuring a 24.2-megapixel CMOS (APS-C) sensor and DIGIC X processor, this content creator camera lets you capture image in stunning clarity and level of detail. A host of video camera functions such as 6K oversampled uncropped 4K movie at up to 30 fps and Dual Pixel CMOS AF II makes the EOS R50 a great 4K camera for video recording and vlogging. Plus, the camera boasts auto subject tracking, including animal, people, and vehicle tracking via deep learning technology, making focusing more reliable than ever. Smartphone-like operability and connectivity makes this an ideal entry-level camera. For rapid continuous shooting, the choice is yours — capture memorable moments at 12 fps with electronic first curtain shutter, or switch up to 15 fps when using silent electronic shutter. Enjoy a full view with zero distractions thanks to this camera's Clear View LCD II vari-angle touchscreen. This 4K digital camera lets you choose your favorite effect by offering an expanded array of auto-compatible scenes. Get inspired, and let Creative Assist and Advanced A+ do the work for you. The versatility and small size of the RF-S18-45mm F4.5-6.3 IS STM lens gives you the flexibility you desire without taking up your whole camera bag.

customers_say: Customers find this camera delivers stunning image quality, particularly praising its vibrant 4K video capabilities, and appreciate its straightforward functions and ease of use. Moreover, they consider it well worth the price and great for beginners, with one customer noting its suitability for small business owners. The autofocus system receives positive feedback for its fast performance. However, opinions about the camera's size are mixed, with some finding it compact while others say it's too small for larger hands.

top_reviews.review_comment: This camera is perfect for beginners! The controls are straightforward and intuitive, so I didn’t feel overwhelmed trying to figure it out. The auto modes work really well, and I was able to start taking great photos right away. There are also lots of YouTube videos on how to best use this camera for beginners.
top_reviews.review_date: Reviewed in the United States on August 26, 2025

top_reviews.review_comment: I've been eyeing this camera for a while and I now I take it with me pretty much everywhere. It has amazing autofocus & the camera is super lightweight!! Great beginners camera & all the functions are very straightforward. Battery takes a few hours to charge & you will have to buy your own SD card. But great quality and great sale!! I brought the used white one only for $600 & they look completely brand new. Great packaging as well. I took these photos attached & edited them in Adobe Lightroom. I love shooting a good motion blur picture & black and white photos with it!! Best gift for myself =D
top_reviews.review_date: Reviewed in the United States on August 13, 2025

top_reviews.review_title: A perfect camera to start vlogging and beyond
top_reviews.review_comment: I bought the Canon EOS R50 as my first mirrorless camera for vlogging and I couldn’t be more satisfied. The image quality is excellent thanks to its 24.2 megapixels, and the 4K video is sharp and smooth—perfect for creating high-quality content without complications. The autofocus is very fast and accurate, even while moving, and the subject detection and tracking feature has been amazing when filming on the go or with more people in the frame. The included lens (RF-S 18-45mm) is very versatile for everyday use and ideal to get started without needing to invest in another lens right away. Plus, it’s a lightweight and compact camera, making it super easy to carry anywhere. The smartphone connection is very useful for quickly transferring photos and videos, and also for remotely controlling the camera. In short, if you’re looking for an easy-to-use, powerful camera designed for content creators, this is a great choice. Highly recommended.
top_reviews.review_date: Reviewed in the United States on July 12, 2025

top_reviews.review_comment: I absolutely love this camera. The quality is amazing when shooting in manual and it has great color accuracy. The battery lasts a really long time which is great too. I don't have to charge the battery very often. The base is smaller than a DSLR camera but that just makes it easier to bring around everywhere. I've taken a lot of cool photos with it so far! I would highly recommend this camera, but if you want a better zoom, the base kit lens only goes up to 45mm so you'd have to purchase another lens.
top_reviews.review_date: Reviewed in the United States on September 25, 2025

top_reviews.review_title: A hopefully sound review of an amazing camera
top_reviews.review_comment: Amazing quality, extremely lightweight, it's the perfect size for on the go use, and overall manages to exceed any possible worries when buying a camera. If you want a good camera and don't want to spend thousands on just the body, this camera is for you. I'm a fan of film, and I'd bought a different camera only to realize that it wasn't what I needed and then sprung for this one. I now have two separate lenses that accomplish the same goal at different distances, and this camera is absolutely stellar at recording, making it not just ideal, but a necessity for anyone who wants a quality picture. If you want good lens options, go with either the, "Canon RF16mm F2.8 STM Lens" or the "Canon RF35mm F1.8". Both are extremely amazing to pair with this, just make sure to buy a second battery (Canon Battery Pack LP-E17) (Image is a little blurry due to motion, the quality is top tier, you can see every hair on a person's face during photo mode)
top_reviews.review_date: Reviewed in the United States on June 30, 2025

top_reviews.review_title: Great results and new technology -- useless learning tools
top_reviews.review_comment: Great camera. I'm very satisfied with the results. I'd warn potential purchasers, though: This is a new beast. It's mirrorless. That's great new technology. But I've had Sony, NIkon and Minolta cameras in the past, and some Canon features are simply NOT universal. So the learning curve has been very steep for someone as experienced as me. This is NOT a professional camera. It's very nice, and what I'd consider to be a "semi-pro" camera. And Canon hasn't shied away from allowing amateurs to check it out. Also, it has only two lenses available now, but for me, that's enough. The problem is that Canon, like most electronics manufacturers these days, offers only a few pages of almost useless documentation for its use. The 100-small-page instruction book that comes with it satisfied my original expectations -- until I realized only about 10 pages of VERY widely-spaced text was in ENGLISH! That was just enough to allow me to turn the camera ON! Users can go online and find some free tutorials, but that's more than a little inconvenient when you're learning to use the features.
top_reviews.review_date: Reviewed in the United States on July 9, 2025

top_reviews.review_comment: This was such a wonderful upgrade. I LOVE this camera. It’s beginning friendly and I have had for months without issues! It shoots fast, I have small hands and it fits so well. Battery life is SO long too! Highly recommend!!
top_reviews.review_date: Reviewed in the United States on October 2, 2025

top_reviews_global.review_comment: EOS R50 は「初心者でもすぐ使える」軽量ミラーレスとして最高の一台です。 片手で持てる約375gの軽さなのに、AF性能がとても優秀で、動く被写体でもしっかり追従。旅行や日常スナップでも安心して撮影できます。 画質は鮮やかで、解像感も高く、自然なボケ味がきれい。初めての一眼カメラとしても、スマホからステップアップしたい人にもおすすめです。

Loja muito atenciosa! Produto original e lacrado, comprei minha r50 e a loja me ajudou agilizando a entrega para me ajudar em uma emergência para utilizar o produto.. Top! O Luiz muito atencioso! Nota 1000 Virei cliente 🤝

The EOS R50 is lightweight, easy to use, and takes amazing photos straight out of the box. Autofocus is fast and reliable, and the lens is versatile for everyday shooting. Perfect balance of quality and portability for travel and content creation.

top_reviews_global.review_title: Fantastic kit for the price - great picture quality and ease of use
top_reviews_global.review_comment: My son is in love with his new camera. Lightweight and at the same time it gives you all necessary possibilities for the photo and video creation
top_reviews_global.review_date: Reviewed in the United Arab Emirates on October 6, 2024

top_reviews_global.review_comment: Great for photography but wont recommend for vlogging! Hard to keep the subject in focus in video mode
